ProductId.title: ProductId
ProductId.description: The Product2Id for the product to be added to the quote.

Quantity.title: Quantity
Quantity.description: The quantity of the product to be added to the quote line. If no quantity is provided, default to 1.

QuoteId.title: QuoteId
QuoteId.description: The quote Id of the quote record to be modified.

StartDate.title: StartDate
StartDate.description: The startDate, needed only for subscription based products. The format must be yyyy-mm-dd.
